clues.text: "God's Shadow" is a biography of Ottoman Sultan Selim, whose conquests included this country, in a 1516 battle near Aleppo

rounds.text: At the winter solstice, the Sun is in Sagittarius; it once appeared in this constellation, giving a geographic feature its name
